analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#268-284) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#280-283)

ZakemFansCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#756-782) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,purchasedTokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#776-777)

ZakemFansCrowdsale.mintTokensForFacilitators (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#820-827) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,fintechfans_tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#823-824)
	-token.mint(bountiesWallet,bounties_tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#824-825)
	-token.mint(foundersWallet,founders_tokens) (/unique_chucks/33/0x5d9a60dcd25966e49a7db368241e8766ca834d61.sol#826)
